message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?

I understand that $180 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $160. It's a great price for a product like this, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting a bit far apart. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $155. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for a product like this.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, but I'm willing to throw in a special bonus package that includes some exclusive content to sweeten the deal. I think this will make it worth your while to meet me at $150.
